topics.body:

*I am forged from storms!*
[Heavy Metal music in the distance]

topics.body: This post is so potent, it decided to post itself twice.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
I wanted to buy Sims 4 at a nearby game store but then I had no money. So, I went to my mom and borrowed money from her. Afterwards, I went back to the store and after I asked for the game, I lost my money. I ran from the store and was pressed for time so I left the mall entirely.When I reached home, I found that the money was hiding behind my phone so I couldn't feel it.

My phone has betrayed me.

...now what?
